text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙa Alloh, ki Parvardigori sumost va ʙa Muhammad, ki pajomʙari sumost va ʙa islom, ki dini sumost hamagon ʙa islom daroed va ʙa cami'i ahkomi U amal kuned va cizero az on tark makuned va rohhoero, ki dar on sajton sumoro ʙa ma'sijat da'vat menamojad, pajravi nakuned, zero ki u dusmani oskori sumost, pas az u hazar kuned
